original_text: And when you came to this place, Sihon the king of Heshbon and Og the king of Bashan came out against us to battle, but we defeated them.
korean_text: 너희가 이 곳에 올 때에 헤스본 왕 시혼과 바산 왕 옥이 우리와 싸우러 나왔으므로 우리가 그들을 치고

sentences.original_text: And when you came to this place,
Sihon the king of Heshbon and Og the king of Bashan
sentences.korean_translation: 헤스본 왕 시혼과 바산 왕 옥이

sentences.original_text: came out against us to battle,
